editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Ff 1r-14v: Supplicatons of Basil, for Monday. F-35r: Supplications of Mar Ephrem, for Tuesday. F-48v: Supplications of Mar Ephrem, for Wednesday. F-69r: Supplications of Aragawi Manfasawi Qeddus Yohannes, for Thursday. F-86r: Supplications of Abba Sinoda Arsay, for Friday. F-101r: Supplications of Saint Atanatwos, for Saturday. F-109v: Supplications of Saint Qerelos, for Sunday, incomplete at the end. F-115r: Image of the Covenant of Mercy, መልክአ፡ ኪዳነ፡ ምሕረት፡, incipit: እግዚአብሔር: ወሃቤ: ብርሃን: ዘይሤለስ በአካሉ።, Répertoire 362. Dillmann, Chrestomathia 136–46; MG 681–700. EMIP 499. F-116v: Image of the Assumption of Mary, መልክአ፡ ፍልሰታ፡ ለማርያም፡, incipit: ሰላም: ለፍልሰተ: ሥጋኪ: ወለነፍስኪ:ኢመዋቲ:, Répertoire 213; EMIP 499. F-122v: Prayer to Jesus Christ. “Praise to You, O my Lord Jesus Christ, with Your Father and Holy Spirit” as Mar Palaskinos prayed. F. i r : Asmat Prayer of Jeremiah against the evil eye. mentions the owner, ዓመቱ ቅድስተ ክርስቶስ. mentions owner ዓመቱ ወለተ ክርስቶስ.

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
